About Us

Accuair - Air Conditioning and Refrigeration Services

Accuair has started its humble beginnings as a start-up business in May 2019 composed of experienced HVAC SUPERVISOR and AIRCON technicians who have worked for more than 17 years in one of the biggest company in Saudi Arabia (which is one of the hottest areas in the Middle East). Accuair team wants to share their experience in the field ofAir Conditioning and Refrigeration by offering various types of quality services.

Accuair specializes in providing good quality and guaranteed services, repairs, installation and maintenance of Air Conditioning and Refrigeration systems. Accuair also expands its quality services on home appliances and machine repairs.

What We Offer

You can always count on us to get to you fast and get the job done right the first time.

Service and Installation

Installation of residential, commercial, & industrial air conditioning & services.

Preventive Maintenance

Periodic servicing and maintenance of AC units to avoid breakdown calls.

System Repair

Highly trained to offer repair services for any AC & Ref breakdowns that you might face.
